SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Customer
Represents a customer entity with details about each customer.
CustomerController
Controller for managing customer records in the customer table.
CustomerDTO
Data Transfer Object for customer information.
CustomerRepository
Repository interface for managing customer entities in the database.
CustomerService
Service layer for managing customer-related business logic and interacting with the database via the CustomerRepository.
EmailBuilderUtil
Utility class for building HTML email messages.
EmailDTO
Data Transfer Object for email details.
Filter
Represents a filter entity for customer spending records.
FilterController
Controller for accessing customer spending records in the customer_spending_ranked table.
FilterRepository
Repository interface for managing filter entities in the database.
FilterService
Service layer for managing customer spending data from the customer_spending_ranked table.
LoginRequest
Data Transfer Object for login request details.
LoginResponseDTO
Data Transfer Object for login response details.
MailerConfig
 
Newsletter
Represents a newsletter entity with details about each newsletter design.
NewsletterController
Controller for managing newsletter templates in the newsletter table.
NewsletterDTO
Data Transfer Object for newsletter template details.
NewsletterRepository
Repository interface for managing newsletter entities in the database.
NewsletterService
Service layer for managing newsletter templates and sending emails.
OilwhereApplication
 
Purchase
Represents a purchase record entity that maps to the "purchase_history" table in the database.
PurchaseController
Controller for managing purchase records in the purchase history table.
PurchaseDTO
Data Transfer Object for purchase details.
PurchaseRepository
Repository interface for managing purchase records in the database.
PurchaseService
Service layer for managing purchase history data and interacting with the database via the PurchaseRepository.
Role
Enum representing the different roles a user can have within the system.
User
Represents a user entity with credentials and role information.
UserController
Controller for managing user-related operations, such as retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and authenticating users.
UserDTO
Data Transfer Object for user details.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing user entities in the database.
UserService
Service layer for managing user data and business logic related to user operations.
